mapper.select: /* ServiceModelMapper.listAll */ SELECT ID, SERVICE_MODEL_NAME , DESCRIPTION , SERVICE_CODE , REG_DT , REG_ID , REG_IP , UPD_DT , UPD_ID , UPD_IP , USE_YN FROM IAAP_STT_SERVICE_MODEL WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'

/* ServiceModelMapper.listPage */ SELECT SSM.ID , SSM.SERVICE_MODEL_NAME , SSM.SERVICE_CODE , SSM.DESCRIPTION , SSM.REG_DT , SSM.REG_ID , SSM.REG_IP , SSM.UPD_DT , SSM.UPD_ID , SSM.UPD_IP , SSM.USE_YN FROM IAAP_STT_SERVICE_MODEL SSM WHERE SSM.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND SSM.SERVICE_MODEL_NAME LIKE '%' || #{serviceModelName} || '%'
AND SSM.SERVICE_CODE LIKE '%' || #{serviceCode} || '%'
AND SSM.REG_ID LIKE '%' || #{uploadedBy} || '%'
AND SSM.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%' || #{description} || '%'
AND SSM.REG_DT >= to_date(#{from} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND SSM.REG_DT >= to_date('2022-01-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND SSM.REG_DT <= to_date(#{to} || ' 23:59:59'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND SSM.REG_DT <= current_date

/* ServiceModelMapper.detail */ SELECT SSM.ID , SSM.SERVICE_MODEL_NAME , SSM.SERVICE_CODE , SSM.DESCRIPTION , SSM.REG_DT , SSM.REG_ID , SSM.REG_IP , SSM.UPD_DT , SSM.UPD_ID , SSM.UPD_IP , SSM.USE_YN FROM IAAP_STT_SERVICE_MODEL SSM WHERE SSM.ID = #{serviceModelId} AND SSM.USE_YN = 'Y'

/* ServiceModelMapper.detailByServiceCode */ SELECT SSM.ID , SSM.SERVICE_MODEL_NAME , SSM.SERVICE_CODE , SSM.DESCRIPTION , SSM.REG_DT , SSM.REG_ID , SSM.REG_IP , SSM.UPD_DT , SSM.UPD_ID , SSM.UPD_IP , SSM.USE_YN FROM IAAP_STT_SERVICE_MODEL SSM WHERE SSM.SERVICE_CODE = #{serviceCode} AND SSM.USE_YN = 'Y'

/* ServiceModelMapper.findByName */ SELECT SSM.ID , SSM.SERVICE_MODEL_NAME , SSM.SERVICE_CODE , SSM.DESCRIPTION , SSM.REG_DT , SSM.REG_ID , SSM.REG_IP , SSM.UPD_DT , SSM.UPD_ID , SSM.UPD_IP , SSM.USE_YN FROM IAAP_STT_SERVICE_MODEL SSM WHERE SSM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND SSM.SERVICE_MODEL_NAME = #{name}
/* ServiceModelMapper.exists */ SELECT case when EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM IAAP_STT_SERVICE_MODEL SSM WHERE SSM.ID = #{serviceModelId} AND SSM.USE_YN = 'Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END isExists FROM dual

/* ServiceModelMapper.existServiceModelName */ SELECT case when EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM IAAP_STT_SERVICE_MODEL SSM WHERE SSM.SERVICE_MODEL_NAME = #{serviceModelName} AND SSM.USE_YN = 'Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END isExists FROM dual

/* ServiceModelMapper.existServiceCode */ SELECT case when EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM IAAP_STT_SERVICE_MODEL SSM WHERE SSM.SERVICE_CODE = #{serviceCode} AND SSM.USE_YN = 'Y') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END isExists FROM dual
mapper.insert: /* ServiceModelMapper.insert */ INSERT INTO IAAP_STT_SERVICE_MODEL( ID , SERVICE_MODEL_NAME , SERVICE_CODE , DESCRIPTION , REG_DT , REG_ID , REG_IP , UPD_DT , UPD_ID , UPD_IP , USE_YN) VALUES ( SEQ_IAAP_STT_SERVICE_MODEL.NEXTVAL , #{serviceModelName} , #{serviceCode} , #{description} , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , #{regId} , #{regIp} , NULL , NULL , NULL , 'Y')
mapper.update:

#{id}
